ALPER.PA.summary: La Perla Fashion Holding N.V. designs, manufactures, and retails luxury lingerie, underwear, nightwear, and swimwear. It offers its products for women and men. The company markets its products through retail and wholesale channels under the La Perla brand. It operates through 70 boutiques, including 44 own and 26 partner-operated boutiques; 40 department stores with shop-in-shops and concessions; 24 outlet stores; and various digital sales platforms, including laperla.com and other third-party operated platforms. The company was formerly known as Glow Media N.V. and changed its name to La Perla Fashion Holding N.V. in May 2018. La Perla Fashion Holding N.V. was founded in 1954 and is based in Schiphol, the Netherlands.

N9VA.SG.summary: Kids Brands House N.V., formerly known as Nanoventure N.V., is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in start-up, early venture, mid venture, PIPES, growth capital, and turnaround investments in medium-sized companies. The firm makes direct equity investments but will also consider silent partnerships and shareholder loans. Kids Brands House N.V invests in companies within the textile business focusing on companies across fashion in Germany and neighboring countries. The firm seeks to invest out of balance sheet and takes majority and minority stake in the portfolio companies. Kids Brands House N.V. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Waalre, The Netherlands.
